<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a3c4d7600c9650983c896303892213221"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a2b9addafd0dbd0f989ed47c4cb88e704">VLIWSchedBoundary</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a3c4d7600c9650983c896303892213221">operator=</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a2b9addafd0dbd0f989ed47c4cb88e704">VLIWSchedBoundary</a> &amp;other) = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#af855b75902853f01361087338474e82d"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#af855b75902853f01361087338474e82d">VLIWSchedBoundary</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a2b9addafd0dbd0f989ed47c4cb88e704">VLIWSchedBoundary</a> &amp;other) = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#aaa50af97a81760e0b9bca79b4812d3e5"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#aaa50af97a81760e0b9bca79b4812d3e5">init</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwmachinescheduler">VLIWMachineScheduler</a> &#42;dag, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetschedmodel">TargetSchedModel</a> &#42;smodel) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a8ef275178044762d05bab6fa2a2e8857">DAG</a> = dag;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a151c9cb90050c235a96edc7bece4d6b7">SchedModel</a> = smodel;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a7f6e6e08cf13bdeb2c3c2fb098245584">CurrCycle</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a0154bd7be9607deec1be88b0c707c0f3">IssueCount</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize the critical path length limit, which used by the scheduling</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cost model to determine the value for scheduling an instruction. We use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a slightly different heuristic for small and large functions. For small</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// functions, it&#39;s important to use the height/depth of the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For large functions, prioritizing by height or depth increases spills.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BBSize = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a8ef275178044762d05bab6fa2a2e8857">DAG</a>-&gt;getBBSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a229ab3226e55a829d946a051d016254d">CriticalPathLength</a> = BBSize / <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a151c9cb90050c235a96edc7bece4d6b7">SchedModel</a>-&gt;getIssueWidth();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BBSize &lt; 50)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We divide by two as a cheap and simple heuristic to reduce the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// critcal path length, which increases the priority of using the graph</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// height/depth in the scheduler&#39;s cost computation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a229ab3226e55a829d946a051d016254d">CriticalPathLength</a> &gt;&gt;= 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For large basic blocks, we prefer a larger critical path length to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// decrease the priority of using the graph height/depth.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxPath = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;SU : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a8ef275178044762d05bab6fa2a2e8857">DAG</a>-&gt;SUnits)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MaxPath = std::max(MaxPath, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a4a6efc0e0ddae589abd29500051b42c9">isTop</a>() ? SU.getHeight() : SU.getDepth());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a229ab3226e55a829d946a051d016254d">CriticalPathLength</a> = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a229ab3226e55a829d946a051d016254d">CriticalPathLength</a>, MaxPath) + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a4a6efc0e0ddae589abd29500051b42c9"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a4a6efc0e0ddae589abd29500051b42c9">isTop</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary/#a82762ba9a6d9a67d70e532100f9512cb">Available</a>.getID() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a8838d66fd452f7cdd09e825269ecbf1fa40f7f0675083aaa0ae6f43946859c03b">ConvergingVLIWScheduler::TopQID</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// SUnit::NodeQueueId: 0 (none), 1 (top), 2 (bot), 3 (both)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a8838d66fd452f7cdd09e825269ecbf1fa0644396ca457428e0f89e799f32a1906"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">enum</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a8838d66fd452f7cdd09e825269ecbf1fa40f7f0675083aaa0ae6f43946859c03b">TopQID</a> = 1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a8838d66fd452f7cdd09e825269ecbf1fa0644396ca457428e0f89e799f32a1906">BotQID</a> = 2, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/#a8838d66fd452f7cdd09e825269ecbf1fa2ec88327b6f9d8705576e81f14e6a2fc">LogMaxQID</a> = 2 &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
